# cpuCacheMode

**Instance Property**

A value that configures the cache mode of CPU mapping of tensors you create with this descriptor.

## Declaration

```swift
var cpuCacheMode: MTLCPUCacheMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLCPUCacheMode/defaultCache].
title: cpuCacheMode
